title: Gyokusenbou Yawa
original_name: 玉仙坊夜話〈ぎょくせんぼうやわ〉
sinopse:
1. Gyokusenbou Yawa (The Night Tale of Gyokusenbou)
2. Matsuwaru Koe (Intertwining Voice)
3. Karada no Jikan
4. Katei no Jijou de Kitsune ni Narimashta. (Because of Family Circumstances, I Became a Fox)
5. Toganin no Mori (Sinner's Forest)
